long_description: The REI XT 85 hipbelt replaces your worn or damaged hipbelt on the REI XT 85 backpack. Precurved design comfortably matches your anatomy from day 1; air-mesh surface promotes ventilation for cool comfort. Webbing system adjusts with a forward pull in an ergonomic motion. Pocket provides handy storage for items needed on the hike. Lash points make it easy to keep camera and GPS pouches within easy reach.
short_description: The REI XT 85 hipbelt replaces your worn or damaged hipbelt on the REI XT 85 backpack.
